definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ne 5:18 a head of cattle, bullock, ox, etc. (oft. + [[חֲמוֹר]], [[שֶׂה]], etc.);—´[[שׁ]]: abs. Is 1:3 +, cstr. Ex 21:35 +, sf. [[שׁוֹרוֹ]] Ex 20:17 +, etc.; pl. [[שְׁוׇרִים]] Ho 12:2;—usu. a single head of cattle, without emphasis on sex (opp. [[בָּקָר]] coll. Ex 21:37, Nu 7:3): as property, spoil of war, etc. Ex 20:17 (E; Gi v:14) = De 5:18, cf. De 5:14, Ex 21:33 (E) ‖ De 22:4, Ex 22:1, Ex 22:1 (‖[[בָּקָר ]] of five head), Ex 22:3, Ex 22:8, Ex 22:9, Ex 22:29, Ex 23:12 (all E), De 22:1, Ge 49:6 (poem in J), De 28:31, Ju Jdg 6:4, 1Sa 12:3, Job 24:3; as licking up ([[לָחַח]]) grass Nu 22:4 (J), feeding Ps 106:20 (in ref. to golden calf), cf. Is 7:25, 32:30; lowing Job 6:5; as intelligent Is 1:3, vicious (goring [[נׇגַח]]) Ex 21:28, Ex 21:28, Ex 21:28 + 11 t. Ex 21 (E); used in ploughing De 22:10, threshing De 25:4, cf. Pr 14:4; drawing wagon Nu 7:3 (P; opp. [[בָּקָר]] coll.); ´[[פְּנֵי שׁ]]: Ez Eze 1:10; specif. of male † Job 21:10 (opp. [[פָּרָה]]), of female † Le 22:28 (H), perhaps also Nu 18:17 (P), appar. generic De 15:19, De 33:17 (poem, fig.); rarely coll. Ge 32:6 (+ [[חאׁן]]), Ex 34:19—cf. Le 27:26 (P)—Jos 6:21, Jos 7:24 (all J), 1Sa 15:3, 1Sa 22:19; † as slaughtered Pr 7:22, for food 1Sa 14:34, 1Sa 14:34 (but v:b read [[אֲשֶׁר]]([[אֶת־]]) with LXX Th We Dr al.), 1Ki 1:19, 1Ki 1:25, De 14:4, Le 17:3 (H), cf. Ne 5:18 ([[אֶחָד]] ´[[שׁ]]:), Pr 15:17; for † sacrifice Ju Jdg 6:25 (´[[פַּר־הַשּׁ]]:, text strange, cf. GFM), Ps 69:32 ([[שׁוֹר פָּר]], but join [[פָּר]] to v:b Bae), 2Sa 6:13, Ho 12:12, Le 9:4, Le 9:18 (P), Le 22:23, Le 22:27 (H), Nu 15:11 (P), De 17:1, De 18:3, cf. Le 7:23, Le 9:19; [[מִשּׁוֹר זֶבַח]] Le 4:10 (P); illicit sacrifice Is 66:3.
